description: Kolmogorov cascade in swarm token economy
hypothesis: Token budget obeys cascade structure: injection at coarse scale (T0 mandatory context) → accumulation at fine scale (T4 tools) — analogous to energy injection at large eddies, dissipation at Kolmogorov microscale

cascade_analysis.interpretation: Positive slope confirms fine-scale (T4) accumulation dominates — consistent with cascade direction. But slope 0.619 < 1.667 suggests weaker-than-Kolmogorov concentration at fine scale.
cascade_analysis.T4_dominance: T4-tools is 54.3% of total budget and 49.3% of drift excess — single dominant scale, unlike smooth cascade

cascade_mapping.T0_mandatory: Injection scale: CLAUDE.md, CORE.md, BASE.md — coarse global context, low volume
cascade_mapping.T1_identity: Large-eddy scale: PHILOSOPHY.md, DEPS.md, SWARM.md — identity/protocol layer
cascade_mapping.T2_protocols: Inertial range: per-session protocols, FRONTIER.md summaries — small and slow-growing
cascade_mapping.T3_knowledge: Sub-inertial: PRINCIPLES.md, lessons, beliefs — moderate growth
cascade_mapping.T4_tools: Dissipation scale: maintenance.py (28k tokens alone) — grows without bound; IS the Kolmogorov microscale equivalent

key_finding: Token cascade is NOT smooth — T4 (tools) is a super-accumulator, not a dissipation sink. maintenance.py alone = 28,246t = 47% of total. This breaks the analogy: in Kolmogorov cascade, small scales dissipate energy. In swarm, T4 ACCUMULATES rather than dissipates — suggesting tools are a pathological sink, not a natural cascade endpoint.
verdict: PARTIALLY_SUPPORTED: cascade direction (fine scale accumulates) is correct, but T4 is an absorbing state rather than a dissipation channel. Implication: tools require periodic compaction analogous to turbulent energy injection reversal.
actionable_implication: Tools at T4 need active compaction — they are not self-limiting like viscous dissipation. Adding a tools-tier size limit (analogous to Kolmogorov microscale cutoff) would prevent budget runaway.
next: F-FLD2 PARTIAL; test T4 token limit policy
